addCriteriaSummary.name: Add Criteria Summary
addCriteriaSummary.hint: If enabled, the merchant will include a summary of the criteria used to generate the merchant's inventory.

closeOnSubmit.name: Close on Submit
closeOnSubmit.hint: If enabled, the merchant window will close after submitting the form. You will need to reload the form for the changes to take effect.

itemPilesSetup.name: [Module] Item Piles Setup
itemPilesSetup.hint: If enabled, the created merchant will have my preferred base setup for the Item Piles module. This includes marking them as a Merchant, setting the quantity to infinite, setting the range to infinite, and setting the level column.

toolbeltBetterMerchantSetup.name: [Module] PF2E Toolbelt - Better Merchant Setup
toolbeltBetterMerchantSetup.hint: If enabled, the created merchant will have my preferred base setup for the PF2E Toolbelt - Better Merchant module. This includes making the infinite stock.

window.amountTip: Control how many unique items are returned.
window.criteriaTip: Tip: Hold Ctrl (or Cmd on Mac) to select multiple options. Hold Shift to select a range.
window.quantityTip: Choose how many of each matching item.
